engineer guide.title: Software Engineering Knowledge Base
engineer guide.description: This started as personal guidance to becoming the GOAT of software engineering, but I realised it wouldn't hurt if there will be multiple version of me. It is work in progress therefore should be used with coutious.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: It was a great learning experience while I was building my own portifolio. I was trying to properly documenting UI components with storybook, creating reusable components and taking advantage of css-in-js approach with styled-components library.

greenrush.title: GreenRush
greenrush.description: Created cart and checkout process with react.

cloudboost.title: CloudBoost
cloudboost.description: Created authentication process on react, updated customers dashboard and worked on stripe intergration with expressjs
